question: Kudremukh iron ore is exported from which of the following cities?
explanation: Kudremukh Iron ore is exported from Mangalore. This company possesses mines of iron ore in Kudremukh located on the Western Ghats an even a plant for pelletisation in Mangalore. The Kudremukh Iron Ore Company Limited came into being in the year 1976 and this mine is considered to rank among the largest mines of iron ore across the world.
